languages.text: "Это сложно описать словами... Поймите, каждый навигатор воспринимает {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} по-особенному. Мой учитель, Великий Регент Ааронто, всегда описывал свои путешествия через Имматериум как странствие по бескрайнему лесу со множеством тропок. И я, ассистируя в первых полетах, пыталась следовать его примеру — безуспешно. Лес не открывался мне".

traits.locale_text: "Это сложно описать словами... Поймите, каждый Навигатор воспринимает {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} по-особенному. Мой учитель, Великий Регент Ааронто, всегда описывал свои путешествия через имматериум как странствие по бескрайнему лесу со множеством тропок. И я, ассистируя в первых полетах, пыталась следовать его примеру — безуспешно. Лес не открывался мне".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."
languages.original_text: "Это сложно описать словами... Поймите, каждый навигатор воспринимает {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} по-особенному. Мой учитель, Великий Регент Ааронто, всегда описывал свои путешествия через Имматериум как странствие по бескрайнему лесу со множеством тропок. И я, ассистируя в первых полетах, пыталась следовать его примеру — безуспешно. Лес не открывался мне".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这种感觉可能很难描述……这么说吧，每位导航者对{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的感觉都不尽相同。我的导师，阿伦托大摄政王，他总是会把亚空间比作巨大的森林，而穿越亚空间的过程，就是在森林中无数条小径中找到正确的那条。我第一次在航行中协助他的时候，徒劳地试着效仿他的做法，但他看到的那片森林并没有在我眼前浮现。”
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: “这种感觉可能很难描述……这么说吧，每位导航者对{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的感觉都不尽相同。我的导师，阿伦托大摄政王，他总是会把亚空间比作巨大的森林，而穿越亚空间的过程，就是在森林中无数条小径中找到正确的那条。我第一次在航行中协助他的时候，徒劳地试着效仿他的做法，但他看到的那片森林并没有在我眼前浮现。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the warp differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

languages.text: «Tal vez resulte difícil describirlo... Verá, cada Navegante percibe la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} de forma diferente. Mi mentor, el gran regente Aaronto, siempre describía sus viajes por el Inmaterio como un gran bosque con rutas incontables. Cuando le ayudaba en sus mis primeros viajes, intenté en vano seguir su ejemplo. Pero ese bosque nunca se me apareció».
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez resulte difícil describirlo... Verá, cada Navegante percibe la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} de forma diferente. Mi mentor, el gran regente Aaronto, siempre describía sus viajes por el Inmaterio como un gran bosque con rutas incontables. Cuando le ayudaba en sus mis primeros viajes, intenté en vano seguir su ejemplo. Pero ese bosque nunca se me apareció».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「説明するのは難しいかもしれませんが…そうですね、航宙士によって{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の捉え方は異なります。私の師であるグレート・リージェント・アーロントは、非物質世界を旅することを、無数の道が存在する広大な森を旅することと表現していました。最初の航海で彼を補佐した私は、無益にも彼に倣おうとしました。ですが、その森は私の前に姿を現すことはなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: 「説明するのは難しいかもしれませんが…そうですね、航宙士によって{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の捉え方は異なります。私の師であるグレート・リージェント・アーロントは、非物質世界を旅することを、無数の道が存在する広大な森を旅することと表現していました。最初の航海で彼を補佐した私は、無益にも彼に倣おうとしました。ですが、その森は私の前に姿を現すことはなかったのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Es könnte schwer zu beschreiben sein ... Wisst Ihr, jeder Navigator nimmt den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} anders wahr. Mein Mentor, der Großregent Aaronto, beschrieb seine Reisen durch das Immaterium immer als Wanderung durch einen riesigen Wald mit unzähligen Pfaden. Und als ich ihm bei den ersten Reisen assistierte, versuchte ich vergeblich, seinem Beispiel zu folgen. Doch der Wald offenbarte sich mir nicht."
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: "Es könnte schwer zu beschreiben sein ... Wisst Ihr, jeder Navigator nimmt den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} anders wahr. Mein Mentor, der Großregent Aaronto, beschrieb seine Reisen durch das Immaterium immer als Wanderung durch einen riesigen Wald mit unzähligen Pfaden. Und als ich ihm bei den ersten Reisen assistierte, versuchte ich vergeblich, seinem Beispiel zu folgen. Doch der Wald offenbarte sich mir nicht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est difficile à décrire... Chaque navigateur perçoit le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} d'une manière différente, voyez-vous. Pour mon mentor, le vénérable régent Aaronto, les voyages dans l'Immaterium étaient semblables à la traversée d'une forêt parcourue de milliers de chemins. Comme j'ai passé mes premiers voyages à ses côtés, j'ai voulu suivre son exemple, mais je n'ai jamais vu la moindre forêt. »
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: « C'est difficile à décrire... Chaque navigateur perçoit le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} d'une manière différente, voyez-vous. Pour mon mentor, le vénérable régent Aaronto, les voyages dans l'Immaterium étaient semblables à la traversée d'une forêt parcourue de milliers de chemins. Comme j'ai passé mes premiers voyages à ses côtés, j'ai voulu suivre son exemple, mais je n'ai jamais vu la moindre forêt. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu tasvir etmek zor olabilir... Şöyle ki her Rotacı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutu{/g} farklı şekillerde algılar. Yönderim Yüce Naip Aaranto, Tindiyar'daki seyahatlerini, sayısız patikanın olduğu engin bir ormandan geçmeye benzetirdi. İlk seyahatlerimde ona yardımcı olurken ben de onu örnek almaya gayret ettim. Gelgelelim nafile bir çabaydı. O orman bana yüzünü bir türlü göstermedi."
languages.original_text: "It may be difficult to describe... You see, every Navigator perceives the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} differently. My mentor, Great Regent Aaronto, always described his travels through the Immaterium as a journey through a vast wood with countless paths. And I, assisting him in the first voyages, futilely tried to follow his example. But the wood would not reveal itself to me."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu tasvir etmek zor olabiliyor... Şöyle ki her Rotacı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}u farklı şekillerde algılıyor. Yönderim Yüce Naip Aaranto, Tindiyar'daki seyahatlerini hep sayısız patikanın olduğu geniş bir ormandan geçmeye benzetirdi. İlk seyahatlerimde ona yardımcı olurken ben de onu örnek almak için gayret sarf etsem de nafileydi. Ormanı asla göremedim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
